==Thoughts==
{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Yunus}}
:{{A|VO Yunus All Schemes to Know 01.ogg}} '''Yunus:''' (I hope the Akademiya doesn't stir up too much trouble.)

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yunus:''' Hello. What can I do for you?
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Adventure Challenge
:;(Opens [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Yunus/The Golden Heist|Genius Invokation TCG match interface]])
:;(If the player loses the match)
:::'''Yunus:''' I won! Hmm... Games like this really test your resource management abilities...
:;(If the player wins the match)
:::'''Yunus:''' What a great way to win. A real eye-opener...
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Yunus:''' I'm the logistics officer for the Citadel of Regzar, responsible for the Corps of Thirty's supplies.
::'''Yunus:''' Except for some mandatory Akademiya assignments, I delegate tasks to Mr. [[Effendi]].
::'''Yunus:''' If someone would help the Corps or residents nearby, I could pay for it with that portion of the fund.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Yunus:''' See you.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* Yunus is most likely based from {{Lang|{{w|Jonah in Islam|Yunus ibn Matta}}|ar=يُونُس ابن ماتا|ar_rm=Yūnus ibn Matta}}, a prophet who has been swallowed by a big fish, often depicted as whale in some art and culture.
